front.title: Transparent Interconnection of Lots of Links (TRILL): Edge Directory Assistance Mechanisms

abstract.t: This document describes mechanisms for providing directory service to TRILL (Transparent Interconnection of Lots of Links) edge switches. The directory information provided can be used in reducing multi-destination traffic, particularly ARP / Neighbor Discovery (ND) and unknown unicast flooding. It can also be used to detect traffic with forged source addresses.
